bibl.title: Landscape and Memory: al-Nabulsi's Ta'rikh al-Fayyum. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - Suggests by examples that the description of the Fayyum by Uthman b. Ibrahim al-Nabulsi has much to offer to the papyrologist, the archaeologist and the ancient historian.

bibl.title: Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning

bibl.seg: KEENAN James G., Landscape and Memory: al-Nabulsi's Ta'rikh al-Fayyum. Avec résumé en anglais.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor-in-Chief), Jennifer E. GATES, Andrew T. WILBURN (Guest Editors), Timothy RENNER, John WHITEHORNE (Editors), Material Culture and Texts of Graeco-Roman Egypt: Creating Context, Debating Meaning = BASP 42 (2005) Special Thematic Section, pp. 203-212.

Paper presented at the Joint American Institute of Archaeology and American Philological Association meeting, Boston, January 7, 2005. - Suggests by examples that the description of the Fayyum by Uthman b. Ibrahim al-Nabulsi has much to offer to the papyrologist, the archaeologist and the ancient historian.
